body.name: 3-Tier Wooden Open Bookcase - Modern Display Bookshelf with Top Edge and Solid Wood Frame for Home and Office, Storage Cabinet, Warm White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 50 mins
features: DURABLE & STURDY - 1.6cm thick MDF board and 30mm diameter beech wood legs make the open bookshelf very sturdy and durable. Each shelf can hold at least 80lbs;

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN - Three 4.73" height side panels design on the edge of each shelf is high enough to keep your books neat, upright and keep items from slipping off. The rounded corners are designed to protect your family from injury. Anti-falling accessory included preventing injury from unexpected tipping of furniture;
MULTI-PURPOSE SHELVING - You can place the storage cabinet in the living room to display any crafts and decorations, in the study to store books or on the balcony for potted plants;

ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIAL - The 3-shelf bookcase is made of solid wood legs(beech) and P2 class environment protection plate and melamine finish, this material is waterproof, anti-scratch and super easy to clean;
SET UP IN 15 MINUTES - Simply assemble each layer of boards and tighten them with solid wood legs to complete the installation.
body.description: OSCHF Wooden Open Shelf Bookcase Floor Standing Bookshelf This bookcase is a modern and elegant storage solution perfect for any home or office. It features beech wood legs and a warm white MDF board that will complement any decor. The bookshelf features three side panels to keep your books upright and prevent them from falling over and keeps your collection neat and tidy. A variety of purposes can be used, such as storing office supplies, displaying your favorite collectibles or as a stylish room divider. Stylish and Functional Keep your Books Organized Multi-Purpose Use

A pair of gloves Color: Warm White + Oak Shelves: 3 / 4 / 5 Materials: P2-grade MDF + Solid wood legs Easy Assembly Free Combination OSCHF Wooden Open Shelf Bookcase Floor Standing Bookshelf This bookcase is a modern and elegant storage solution perfect for any home or office. It features beech wood legs and a warm white MDF board that will complement any decor. The bookshelf features three side panels to keep your books upright and prevent them from falling over and keeps your collection neat and tidy. A variety of purposes can be used, such as storing office supplies, displaying your favorite collectibles or as a stylish room divider. Stylish and Functional Keep your Books Organized Multi-Purpose Use

Round Corners Design This is especially important if you have children or pets who might accidentally bump into the bookcase. Easy to Clean The shelf is 5.5 cm off the ground that can be cleaned easily. Stable Rubber Gasket Rubber gaskets are equipped to better protect the board and prevent loose.

High-Class Beech Wood Legs The bookcase features 30mm diameter beech wood legs, which is known for its hardness and resistance to bending. This makes the bookshelf very sturdy and prevents it from wobbling, ensuring that it will last for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, and looks good. Assembly was straightforward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Stylish
reviews.reviewText: I really do like the simple yet stylish look of this shelf unit. I was very pleased that I could put it together very easily as I have arthritis and trouble with movement. This is a good quality unit and should last for a very long time. I am using it in my bedroom, but it would look great anywhere in a home. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice shelf unit at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy however maybe not as large as you’d think
reviews.reviewText: Really like this bookcase, goes well with the decor in the house, however I am going to have to buy another, being that it isn’t quite as a large as I was expecting, the reference photos for this item I feel are a bit off. if you have large collector editions of books, you might not want to purchase this case sadly, the height of each shelf can only hold standard sized books for the most part.However, the assembly was relatively easy and it doesn’t look half bad. It’s a pretty good choice if your looking for a budget option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together and a good size
reviews.reviewText: I picked this shelf because it’s not bulky but is still large enough for me to keep hoarding books:) it was easy to put together and is pretty sturdy for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build
reviews.reviewText: Easy to build and have everything needed to build it in the package. It has a modern look and the color is neutral and nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need to put it together when arrives
reviews.reviewText: Not your usual bookcase, which is exactly what my granddaughter wanted. It's very attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two bookcases because I didn’t think one would be enough. I was right. I am glad that I did. The instructions were easy to follow, I had all of my tools that came with, but it took a minute to assemble. But, once I got going into building the bookcase, one by one, it became easier. By the time, I was able to build the second one. I didn’t need the instructions since I had it down pact. This is by far my favorite bookcase that I had bought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this shelf
reviews.reviewText: Easy but time consuming assembly, but definitely worth it! Fits all my books as intended.
